column1: Baby Barnaby's////Unlike most of my kin who prefer to go elbows deep into something fried and bacon-ey after a night of drinking
column2: I prefer starting my mornings off right. Luckily
column3: Baby Barnaby's feeds both crowds. There
column4: folks like myself can nosh on chicken apple sausage
column7: cup o' fruit and sip on freshly squeezed juices ... And of course they have the necessary bacon
column10: and pork chops to "meat" others' needs. Check out the menu:
